title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: I observed that the report design stores an absolute path instead of a relative path for the included library. For example, <property name="fileName" value="E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary" /><property name="namespace" value="lib1" />.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open a report design in BIRT designer. 2. Include a library in the report design. 3. Verify that the included library's file path is stored as a relative path instead of an absolute path. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
